title: Dr. Carter
description: Which is better, Chinese medicine or Western medicine?Which is better, Money or Family?Which is better, Forgive or Forget?Dr. Carter will give you the answer!This full-length romance is packed with heart and heat. No cheating or cliffhangers! Dr. Carter has just graduated from medical school as a gynecologist. Bullied by the dean, despised by colleagues, and complained by female patients.Dr. Carter is a loser?NO!Inadvertently Dr. Carter obtains the secret of the mysterious Eastern healing arts and becomes a miracle doctor. Billionaires, policemen, senators and actresses all seek his medical treatment.Dr.Carter rebels against a rigged and unequal system to rise up and become a new kind of master.Dr. Carter, an angsty, sexy, contemporary romance.It features a strong hero struggling with fate.Download today to meet your new favorite book.
author: Sheila Gates
